text: Ryuma Hirota (born 13 August 1976) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Equestrians at the 2006 Asian Games
title: Ryuma Hirota
